Heroes_Villains.entities.npc

Class Villain

  • java.lang.Object
    • Heroes_Villains.entities.Entities
      • Heroes_Villains.entities.npc.NPC
        • Heroes_Villains.entities.npc.Villain

  • public class Villain
extends NPC
    Represents the villain NPC used to assess the battle state. Extends NPC.
